name: fun.ts
description: An attempt to an approchable, practical functional standard library for Typescript.
author: Federico "Lox" Lucignano

scripts.clean: echo '=> Cleaning up...' && rm -Rf build && echo '\tSUCCEEDED'
scripts.test: echo '=> Running tests...' && tsc && node build/test-runner.js && echo '\tSUCCEEDED'
scripts.build: echo BUILD STARTED at `date` && npm test && npm run clean && npm run compile && echo COMPLETED at `date`
